title: Who am I?
subtitle: I am a 24 year old Brit living in The Netherlands. I love 🍕 and 🎸 I dislike peas and rainy weekends 🤢 If you are reading this, I am probably looking for a job so I would also like to say, I am the most amazing colleague ever and I am both incredibly witty and talented
